altername_name: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
Tintin no Bouken: Unicorn-Gou no Himitsu
name: The Adventures of Tintin: The Game
overview: Players will experience non-stop action and adventure as they investigate the mystery of a lifetime that may lead them to one of the greatest sunken treasures. But the quest won't be easy and players will need to join forces with the quick-witted dog Snowy and the grumpy Captain Haddock to beat greedy art collectors, kooky arms dealers, and other crooks to reveal the truth behind the Secret of the Unicorn ship.
